page.title: 10Spare Time Activities
page.content: On a Monday I go to ballet in Settle at 5.30pm. On Tuesday I go to Brownies .We go at 6.00pm.This is a club only for girls.It is at Hellifield School.We play games there and make hats and things like that.Sometimes we make sweets and other times we go to the Brownie Hut. On Thursday I go to the Swimming Club in Settle.We swim 10 lengths nearly every week.We water tread for three minutes,and do other activities concerned with swimming. On a Saturday I go to the Skipton Music Centre.Children travel to this Centre from many towns and villages to play instruments together and make an orchestra.We play a piece of music called Star Gazing. On a Sunday I go to choir at St. Adian's Church.
